message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to part with it for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product to me is high, but I am only able to offer $1050000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to negotiate a good deal, but I'm afraid $1050000 is still below my minimum asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1275000. This is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $1150000 for the product. I believe this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, $1150000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer the product to you for $1225000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I will counter with $1180000. I hope this brings us closer to a satisfactory agreement.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $1200000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with $1195000. I believe this is a fair price given the value I place on the product.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already compromised significantly. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your latest counteroffer, which is $1192500. This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. I will counter with $1190000 for the product. I hope this final offer allows us to reach an agreement.
